plot: About a bed gone bad and the woman who can't get out. A femme horror short about a woman obsessed with an Estate sale four poster bed and what happens when you really do decide to stay in bed and hide under your covers.
title: Sleep Tight... A Bed Time Story
plot_es: About a bed gone bad and the woman who can't get out. A femme horror short about a woman obsessed with an Estate sale four poster bed and what happens when you really do decide to stay in bed and hide under your covers.
original_name: Sleep Tight... A Bed Time Story
plot_en: About a bed gone bad and the woman who can't get out. A femme horror short about a woman obsessed with an Estate sale four poster bed and what happens when you really do decide to stay in bed and hide under your covers.
